a-tooltip-common/arrowPointAtCenter.description: Whether the arrow is pointed at the center of target

a-tooltip-common/autoAdjustOverflow.description: Whether to adjust popup placement automatically when popup is off screen

a-tooltip-common/defaultVisible.description: Whether the floating tooltip card is visible by default

a-tooltip-common/getPopupContainer.description: The DOM container of the tip, the default behavior is to create a div element in body.

a-tooltip-common/mouseEnterDelay.description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is shown on mouse enter

a-tooltip-common/mouseLeaveDelay.description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is hidden on mouse leave

a-tooltip-common/overlayClassName.description: Class name of the tooltip card

a-tooltip-common/placement.description:
The position of the tooltip relative to the target, which can be one of top
left right bottom topLeft topRight bottomLeft bottomRight leftTop leftBottom rightTop rightBottom

a-tooltip-common/visible.description: Whether the floating tooltip card is visible or not

a-tooltip-common/destroyTooltipOnHide.description: Whether to destroy tooltip on hide

a-tooltip-common/align.description: this value will be merged into placement's config, please refer to the settings dom-align
